Name: Sand Scarab Robes
Description: Enigmatic Egyptian-inspired attire with desert-themed motifs, embodying mystical power and nimble grace.

Name: Carrotguard Ensemble
Description: Lively armor set inspired by carrots, exuding charm and vitality.

Name: Duskblade Garb
Description: Dark blue medieval-inspired armor with a rugged cape.

Name: Icecool Jacket
Description: The jacket itself is ice-cold but, surprisingly, it keeps you warm.

Name: Poochguard Armour
Description: Fierce and formidable armor adorned with the visage of a noble canine warrior.

Name: Lilypond Armour
Description: Enchanting armor reminiscent of the serene depths of a mystical forest pond.

Name: Cockadoodle Armour
Description: Vibrant and spirited armor evoking the spirited nature of a proud rooster's presence.

Name: Aquatic Enchantress
Description: Mystical deep-diving armor that blends witchcraft with the secrets of the sea, exuding an aura of captivating power.

Name: Shadowcat Visage
Description: A sleek and ominous armor, with the essence of a feline predator, exuding an aura of darkness and striking fear into the hearts of all who dare to oppose.

Name: Amethyst Shardplate
Description: An awe-inspiring suit of armor, forged from the shards of majestic purple amethyst, radiating both strength and mystic beauty.

Name: Thornshield Vestment
Description: Adorned with thorny motifs, bestowing unwavering protection and commanding authority, evoking the essence of a mighty fortress.

Name: Blizzardborn Armour
Description: Frozen might personified, commanding snowstorm strength.
